title: Advisor Platforms Program Manager - AppleCare
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish...
description: In this highly visible role, you will need to be a skilled communicator with the ability to move fluidly between communication styles to meet a varied audience; must be able to present to leadership one day and host a roundtable with users the next. You must be great teammate with a passion for debate...
key_qualifications: Extensive knowledge of the AppleCare Contact Center systems are highly desired. Experience with SAP not required but may be a plus. Effectively expresses ideas and thoughts verbally and in written form up to and including executive leadership. Ability to adapt to fast-paced work environment with shifting priorities a must. Ability to take initiative and work under limited direction is a must. Ability to maintain and develop relationships within the cross-functional teams. Strong and creative problem-solving skills. Passion for providing service and support that surprises and delights customers. Must excel at working with cross functional team for change management. Strong organizational and documentation skills. MBA a plus.
